column4: Please, can anyone help getting Ubuntu running on a G3? I am currently using it on a intel box and it worked fine but isn't with the g3.
does it help if i know how to get it to work on a g4?
please put my name on your replies if you want me to notice them :-)
G4 might help, tried the support forum but to no avail so far though.
yes, i've read this now... but what is your problem?
the problem is that even if i boot holding the c key, it just goes to a white screen with a command prompt.
and does mac work on that machine?
yes, the prompt is after the "welcome dapper" screen.
so, the c key works or not?
that is: when you press the c key does it boot on the cdrom?
yes, it must do to have the ubuntu screen, I believe but it must be cutting out or something.
sorry, you're giving me too few and too general informations. if you don't exactly describe what's happening there, we/I can't guess!
wondered if it's a dodgy disk but not sure how to check or anything.
... and now i have to leave an prepare the dinner.
the simpliest way is to download again the iso... or to burn a new cd... 1/2 hour if you have some sort of DSL
are you back yet please? Sorry, my friend (laddercoins) can be more specific about the problem with the G3.
